actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution recognizing the 63rd anniversary of India's independence, expressing appreciation to Americans of Indian descent for their contributions to society, and expressing support and optimism for the strategic partnership and friendship between the United States and India in the future.
subjects: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

summary.text: Recognizes the 63rd anniversary of India's independence. Celebrates the contributions of Americans of Indian descent to U.S. society. Supports the advancement of the U.S.-India strategic partnership.

titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 63rd anniversary of India's independence, expressing appreciation to Americans of Indian descent for their contributions to society, and expressing support and optimism for the strategic partnership and friendship between the United States and India in the future.
